title: Add XLM-V
raw_output:
{'files_to_modify': ['src/transformers/models/xlm_v/modeling_xlm_v.py', 'src/transformers/models/xlm_v/tokenization_xlm_v.py', 'src/transformers/models/xlm_v/configuration_xlm_v.py', 'src/transformers/models/auto/modeling_auto.py', 'src/transformers/models/auto/tokenization_auto.py'], 'reasoning': "1. modeling_xlm_v.py: New model implementation for XLM-V, analogous to modeling_xlm_roberta.py, is the most crucial part.
2. tokenization_xlm_v.py: Required to handle XLM-V's vocabulary and tokenization logic, as XLM-V introduces a new approach for vocab scaling.
3. configuration_xlm_v.py: Important to add model configuration parameters specific to XLM-V and enable proper model instantiation.
4. modeling_auto.py: Needs updating to register XLM-V as a supported architecture for automatic model loading (AutoModel).
5. tokenization_auto.py: Needs updating to enable automatic tokenizer loading for the new XLM-V tokenizer class.
These cover core support for XLM-V within the Transformers repo; further changes to Flax/TensorFlow or docs may be needed for full coverage, but are lower priority."}
